definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
see 稱心如意|称心如意[chen4 xin1 ru2 yi4]

sentences.english: I found a satisfying job at last.
sentences.chinese: 我终于找到了可心的工作。

sentences.english: While satisfying Jiang did not go home, but a man quietly in the lake.
sentences.chinese: 而蒋可心也没有回家，而是在湖边一个人静静。

sentences.english: The clown could change his expression from sadness to happiness in a flash.
sentences.chinese: 那小丑可心在一瞬间把他的表情从悲伤变成快乐。

sentences.english: My grand-daughter is a little doll.
sentences.chinese: 我的孙女是个可心人儿。

sentences.english: I can influence people but I can’t change anyone.
sentences.chinese: 我可心影响人们，但不能改变任何人。

sentences.english: The following story is about a sweetheart deal which I made last week.
sentences.chinese: 这个故事是关于上周我做的一笔可心的买卖。

sentences.english: I miss you, be tired, you will still go.
sentences.chinese: 我在想念，可心已疲倦，你给的终究还是走了。

definition: one's thoughts/mind/intention/willingness to accept new ideas/baseless suspicions
hidden smile/smirk/to rejoice covertly/secret satisfaction concerning one's evil plans
at sixes and sevens/perturbed state of mind/in a mess
bottom tip of the heart/fig. innermost feelings/coll. my darling
